title: Waiting list down as NHS ‘approaches its limit’ ahead of strikes and flu
description: The NHS waiting list is 230,000 lower than July last year, even as the health service ‘approaches its limit’ with A&E and ambulances facing record demand ahead of winter. title: Hundreds more blood cancer patients to receive life-giving drug on NHS
description: Hundreds more people with an aggressive form of blood cancer can now be offered hope of a cure and “a new lease of life” from today thanks to an NHS drug rollout. title: Record numbers of people with type 2 diabetes benefit from NHS ‘soups and shakes’
